baseName.value: Polymer Bitumen Waterproofing Membranes: GUMMIFLEX CLASSIC 4 PL

generalComment.value:
In choosing the data to be used for the study, we tried to favor primary data that can be cataloged by the company. This data is the primary source of information for inventory analysis. They can be grouped according to environmental performance indicators, from which environmental impact can be calculated.


"Inventory data was reported to production total in mq in the reference year to be able arrive at consumption according to the chosen declared unit. In this study, therefore, an attempt was made to divide the data
in and out while maintaining the principle of modularity: materials and energy flows to and from the environment is then assigned to the module in which it occurs. The allocation criteria adopted for the LCA model comply with the reference standards (EN 15804, ISO 14044) and are mainly based on the mq of production."


"During the study of the product they were included in the cut-off the following flows: additive transport and management of waste similar to urban waste.
Furthermore, the VOCs sent to the thermal power plant are not excluded since they would account for less than 1% compared to CO2 emissions."

descriptionOfRestrictions.value: Valli Zabban has established itself in the field of the sector of bituminous waterproofing systems in civil and infrastructural construction in Italy and around the world.

technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse.value: "The raw materials that make up the membrane waterproofing are: Compound (bitumen, filler, polymers PP-PE-SBS recycled 10 - 15 %); Reinforcement non-woven polyester or fiberglass (recycled 0 - 5 %) and others additives. "

technologicalApplicability.value:
"The products analyzed are bitumen/polymer waterproofing membranes
 for the circular economy at high recycled element content, LEED compliant, made from distilled bitumen modified with APAO polyolefins and stabilized reinforced polyester armor, used for waterproofing new civil engineering works and renovations."
 "The bitumen is supplied in the molten state (150 – 160 °C) from the refinery and is stored in tanks of storage. The filler is transported at temperature environment from pressure tanks directly in storage silos. The other raw materials they arrive at the factory with trucks with big curtainsiders bag and transported to the warehouse using diesel forklifts. When preparing the mix, the bitumen is transferred, through suitable piping, in the melter.Subsequently, in based on the formulation of the compound to be produced and after raising the temperatures to approx 200°C, the following are introduced: the polymers (PP-PE-SBS), the filler and a percentage of various additives. To fusion occurred, the compound is transferred to the “fuser of storage” and sent only later in the impregnation tank at the beginning of the line production, ready to be processed. In the production line department, the reinforcement, in advance placed at the beginning of the line, it is immersed in the tub, soaked and laminated across calenders that regulate the thickness of the product according to production requests. The product like this obtained undergoes a slow cooling process by means of special rollers equipped with a system of cooling down. Then the membrane in the cooling phase is coupled to the external finishes and embossed with special rollers. In the final part of the
production line, the membrane is rolled up, taped, identified and palletised. The individual rolls on wooden pallets they are sent to the kiln, where it is made the packaging with polyethylene heat-shrink caps. The pallets are transported to the warehouse finished products using diesel forklifts trucks."

shortDescription.value: PCR ICMQ 3.0 - rev. 3.0 - Products and services for construction

useAdviceForDataSet.value: The approach is a cradle to gate with options: A1, A2, A3, A4 (MDN), A5 (MDN), B1 (MDN), B2 (MDN), B3 (MDN), B4 (MDN), B5 (MDN), B6 (MDN), B7 (MDN), C1, C2, C3, C4, D

publicationAndOwnership.licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
